        public static short bytesToShort(byte a,
                                 byte b)
        Unite two bytes to one short.
        Parameters:
        a - Left part of short.
        b - Right part of short.
        Returns:

      • bytesToChar

                               byte b)
        Unite two bytes to one char.
        Parameters:
        a - Left part of char.
        b - Right part of char.
        Returns:

      • bytesToInt

        public static int bytesToInt(byte a,
                             byte b,
                             byte c,
                             byte d)
        Unite four bytes to one int.

        Lets suppose that int is an array of 4 bytes.

        Parameters:
        a - [0] part of int.
        b - [1] part of int.
        c - [2] part of int.
        d - [3] part of int.
        Returns:
        Integer - composition of four bytes.

      • toUpperCase

        public static char toUpperCase(Character c)
        Trying to simulate (Shift + c).
        Parameters:
        c - character.
        Returns:
        {Shift + c} if possible or c if already (Shift + c). In other keys returns 0.
